column1: Sometimes the touch screen doesn't work properly

I bought this through exchange offer. So gave off my lenovo k6 and chose this in exchange.
Let me frank, I am so happy with the value amazon gave for my old phone and the price at which I got my brand new vivo y81.Damn sure, no shop could have given a better deal.
Can you believe,by seeing the deal which I received, my spouse(who always stay miles away from online shopping) was also planning to get his I phone 6 exchanged through amazon!!!
Now about vivo y81...very good phone, sound quality is amazing.camera also nice.
The whole look of phone is fabulous.
The back portion is glossy and gives a stylish look.
Easy to handle as well.

I got the worst product, never buy at online.. While I compare y81 online and at out side SANGEETHA mobiles demo,  both same mobiles but display brightness and camera worst with compare to original vivo y81

If you're someone who wants a power packed phone with all the necessary features and that too at an affordable price, then go for it.

The best thing is the battery. Charge it once and you can use it all day long. The charger is a basic one and not a fast charger.
